articles.author: Mike Pearl
articles.title: Bitcoin Mining is Being Used to Offset Heating Costs in Greenhouses and Homes
articles.description: Of course, bitcoin critics would argue there is nothing truly gained here in terms of energy efficiency.
articles.content: One of the side effects of the energy-intensive process of bitcoin mining is the excess heat that is created by the involved hardware devices.

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Two cybersecurity employees plead guilty to carrying out ransomware attacks
articles.description: Two former employees at cybersecurity firms have pleaded guilty to carrying out a series of ransomware attacks.
articles.content: The pair targeted several companies with ALPHV / BlackCat ransomware and extorted $1.2 million in Bitcoin.
